title: Facebook應對香港禁言禁制令同煽動罪請政策專員

replies.msg:
Responsibilities
• Develop policy strategy and policy positions on harmful content regulation, online speech, and media policy issues
• Identify, monitor, and analyze these policy issues at the international level
• Articulate our positions on these policy issues in briefing papers, consultation responses and internal policy meetings
• Advise Facebook business and product teams on these policy matters to guide development of products and services
• Represent Facebook in meetings with key stakeholders, including civil society groups, government officials, and academics
• Communicate Facebook’s positions in public presentations
